version_description:
• "Aegean for Families"
• Minor bug fixes
• Minor bug fixes

• Multi-City - More flight search options available
• Fixed issues that prevented the app from loading properly on iPod touch

This release sets the ground for the completely redesigned Book a Flight and My Booking services.

Please update now your Aegean app in order to experience the new services that will be available in the coming days.

New features:
• 15-day calendar view
• New payment methods: Paypal, Sofort Banking (available for accounts in Germany, Austria, Switzerland and Belgium) and Maestro.
• Rent a car and book a hotel along with your flight (hotel available for tablets only)
• Login during booking
• View your booking summary in the shopping basket
• Bookings for young adult passengers (12-15 years old) for flights departing from the UK
• Add booking to your calendar
• Share your booking to social media

Miles+Bonus
• Receive information, updates and reminders via notifications about your tier status.
• Keep track of all your notifications in the new notifications inbox.
• Get your digital card automatically updated in the Wallet when your tier or the expiration date changes.

Create or use your existing “My Aegean” account and:

• Store your personal details and make your flight booking and check in faster and more convenient
• View your upcoming flights
• Manage your active bookings
• Manage your profile and preferences

Stay logged in to your account!
Any time you log in to your account, you'll stay logged in unless you decide to log out.

Issues with “Rent a Car” service have been fixed.

Create or use your existing “My Aegean” account and:

• Store your personal details and make your flight booking and check in faster and more convenient
• View your upcoming flights
• Manage your active bookings
• Manage your profile and preferences

Stay logged in to your account!
Any time you log in to your account, you'll stay logged in unless you decide to log out.

Stay up-to-date with the latest information about your flight on your Aegean app. Now, you will always be notified automatically about:
• Gate number information
• Changes of the departure gate
• Possible delay in your flight’s departure
• Proceeding to your gate when it opens
All the messages that you receive are added to your notifications inbox, which can be accessed at any time.

Get your boarding pass automatically updated on Wallet.

Scan your passport or identity card using the camera of your device and speed up the check-in process!

- Aegean Widget
Add Aegean to your widgets and get timely information for your upcoming flight, without having to access the app.
• View your booking
• Be informed when your flight is open for check-in
• Have your boarding pass readily accessible

- Minor bug fixes

• You can now change the date and the time of your flight.
• Minor bug fixes.
Reported battery consumption issue has been fixed.

• Performance Improvements
• Minor Bug Fixes

• New payment methods: iDeal (Netherlands), Bancontact (Belgium) & EPS (Austria)
• Improved boarding passes overview page.
• Save boarding passes in the app via SMS or e-mail.
• Minor bug fixes

• New payment methods: iDeal (Netherlands), Bancontact (Belgium) & EPS (Austria)
• Improved boarding passes overview page.
• Save boarding passes in the app via SMS or e-mail.
• Minor bug fixes.

• Redeem the Bonus points you have collected through your Alpha Bank Bonus card.
• Enter promotional code while booking your flight.
• Share the boarding passes under the same reservation with your travel companions.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.

• New, redesigned Timetable
• Hide/Unhide your personalized home screen flight panel
• Widget available in compact mode for iOS 10
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements

• iPhone X adjustments
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements

• Redeem your Bank of Cyprus antamivi points for flights.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.

• Business Class passengers have now the ability to pre-order their Business Class meal on international flights.
• Add your travelling companions to your profile and save time during booking.
• Purchase award or tier miles and boost your miles balance.
• Share award miles through our new services: Gift, Transfer and Donate miles.
• Redeem your miles for Star Alliance flights.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.

• Redeem your Eurobank €pistrofi euros on any AEGEAN or Olympic Air flight.
• Fast Track service for Schengen flights.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements

• Find the ideal seat type for your next flight.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.

• We have updated our Privacy Notice and introduced the Cookie Information section in accordance to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
• Our new “Hold My Booking” service gives you more time to decide on your next trip.
• Minor bug fixes and general improvements.

* Quickly access useful information directly from the Home Screen using the new Aegean Widget on iOS 14
* Now, you can sign-in with Google as well
* View your Boarding Group information directly on your boarding pass, and enjoy a simplified boarding experience

* Quickly access useful information directly from the Home Screen using the new Aegean Widget on iOS 14
* Now, you can sign-in with Google as well
* View your Boarding Group information directly on your boarding pass, and enjoy a simplified boarding experience

In the context of providing proactive quality services to passengers and streamline processes and procedures for checking travel documents, you can now scan your COVID Certificate QR Code and display it under your Mobile Boarding Pass at the airport.
